Question: This person was hit by a brick during one march but continued to lead marches in the face of personal danger.
Hints: This person was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and the Congressional Gold Medal posthumously.
A tape recording of several of this person's extramarital liaisons, excerpted from FBI wiretaps, accompanied the letter.
This person was booked in room 306 at the Lorraine Motel, owned by Walter Bailey, in Memphis.
